name: Qt VNC Viewer
short_description:
This project provides a Qt based VNC client with specific extensions appropriate
for use with the VNC OSD interface for MAME/MESS/UME.

Please see the project's wiki-page for more details:
http://wiki.batcom-it.net/index.php?title=VNC_OSD_interface

The Qt VNC Viewer, Copyright (C) 2015 René Reucher, is free software
distributed under the terms of the MAME license (http://mamedev.org/legal.html).

The RFB protocol client code is based on LibVNCServer v0.9.9, Copyright (C)
2001 - 2012 Johannes E. Schindelin (http://libvncserver.sourceforge.net/).
summary: Qt based VNC viewer with MAME/MESS specific extensions
